title: The Trainee Gets Trolled
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:scp-offices-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:scp-human-resources]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:centered-header-bhl]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:toggle-sidebar-bhl]]

[[module CSS]]
:root {
    --logo-image: url("https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/grigori-karpin-s-author-page/vanguard%20transparent.png");
    --header-title: "ANGUARD";
    --header-subtitle: "SHELTER - NORMALIZE - INFORM";
    --header-h2-font-size: 1.1em;
}

#header::before {
    left: -12rem;
    filter: brightness(125%);
    opacity: 1;
}

#header h1 a::before {
    font-size: unset;
}

#header h2::before {
    color: #fe4;
}

#header h2 {
    top: 1em;
}

#header #login-status {
    left: -2vw;
}

@media (max-width: 767px) {
    #header::before {
        left: -7rem;
    }

    #header h1 {
        top: 0.5em;
        left: 0.5em;
    }
}

#page-title {
    display: none;
}

[[/module]]

[[=]]
[[span style="font-family: 'Copperplate Gothic'; color: #B61805; font-size: 280%"]]**The Trainee Gets Trolled**[[/span]]
[[/=]]
-----
[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
[[=]]
**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/guezma-s-uncoordinated-ramblings | More by this author]]]**
@@ @@
[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/no-return-hub | The canon this tale is set in.]]]

[[/=]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]


------

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/the-trainee-gets-trolled/Ron%20pfp
|username=Ron Gambi
|handle=curiousRG
|void-msg=[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/facing-forward As part of my training for the PR department], I was told it would be good if I got used to the anomalous social media. My first reaction was "wait there's a what now?" and after looking it up, here I am! 
|echoes=0
|hums=2
|time-and-date=3:07 PM - 11 April 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/the-trainee-gets-trolled/Ron%20pfp
|username=Ron Gambi
|handle=curiousRG
|void-msg=Hold on, this thing has been around for HOW long? Looks like I have a lot of homework to do.
|echoes=0
|hums=16
|time-and-date=4:15 PM - 11 April 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/guezma-worskhop/Blackboard%20teacher%20pfp
|username=Teaching Master
|handle=teachmastr925673
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂curiousRG [[/span]] Hello I am a good professor for homework. DM me for my rates.
|echoes=0
|hums=0
|time-and-date=4:16 PM - 11 April 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/guezma-worskhop/Lybrarian
|username=Enlightener Librarian
|handle=The_Lybrarian
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂curiousRG [[/span]] Psst, The Serpent doesn't want you to know this, but can you get some of the Library's knowledge outside of it. Very useful for homework and essays! DM me for more info.
|echoes=0
|hums=0
|time-and-date=4:16 PM - 11 April 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/guezma-worskhop/Grandma%20pfp
|username=Joanna Gambi
|handle=curiousJG
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂curiousRG [[/span]] Hi dearie. This reminds me of when you were just a little boy in school and I would help you with you homework, you were so cute. Do you still need Granny's help? DM me to summon my soul.
|echoes=0
|hums=0
|time-and-date=4:16 PM - 11 April 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/the-trainee-gets-trolled/Ron%20pfp
|username=Ron Gambi
|handle=curiousRG
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂curiousJG [[/span]] who are you and how did you get this picture of my dead grandma?
|echoes=0
|hums=7
|time-and-date=4:18 PM - 11 April 2023
]]
-----
[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/the-trainee-gets-trolled/Ron%20pfp
|username=Ron Gambi
|handle=curiousRG
|void-msg=I'm in the mood for trivia. Anyone here know some fun facts?
|echoes=5
|hums=28
|time-and-date=11:07 AM - 03 June 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/guezma-worskhop/elongaytedman%20pfp
|username=Slenderman's Gay Cousin
|handle=elongaytedman
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂curiousRG [[/span]] did you know that Vincent Anderson once tried to create real-life customisable "avatars" you could pilot from a special headset? Unfortunately, he contracted a rare sukmaten infection and died before it could be finished.
|echoes=0
|hums=13
|time-and-date=11:30 AM - 03 June 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/the-trainee-gets-trolled/Ron%20pfp
|username=Ron Gambi
|handle=curiousRG
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂elongaytedman [[/span]] Who is Vincent Anderson?
|echoes=0
|hums=12
|time-and-date=11:31 AM - 03 June 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/guezma-worskhop/elongaytedman%20pfp
|username=Slenderman's Gay Cousin
|handle=elongaytedman
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂curiousRG [[/span]] SUK MA TEN TACLES LMAO GOTTEM!
|echoes=5
|hums=31
|time-and-date=11:32 AM - 03 June 2023
]]

-----
[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/the-trainee-gets-trolled/Ron%20pfp
|username=Ron Gambi
|handle=curiousRG
|void-msg=Big news for all "learning stuff" fans: Vanguard is releasing a lot of documents from our predecessors to third parties. Get ready for a whole new dimension of [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/esterberg-city-wikipedia Wikipedia deep dives] . Personally, I already have 20 new tabs open (some of this stuff is really wild).
|echoes=50
|hums=120
|time-and-date=10:21 AM - 12 June 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/guezma-worskhop/Arnlodpfp
|username=Arnold_Malarmé
|handle=Arnold37902
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂curiousRG [[/span]] Partnering with Wikipedia? Really? That platform is totally unreliable when it comes to information. But I guess that's to be expected from #LyingVanguard . 
|echoes=38
|hums=2
|time-and-date=10:25 AM - 12 June 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/guezma-worskhop/lioncone
|username=Silicon Beast
|handle=siliconbeast
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂Arnold37902 [[/span]] Ok boomer.
|echoes=0
|hums=40
|time-and-date=10:26 AM - 12 June 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/guezma-worskhop/dracofruit
|username=Liver Hurty
|handle=hurtliver
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂Arnold37902 [[/span]] Ok boomer.
|echoes=0
|hums=40
|time-and-date=10:26 AM - 12 June 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/guezma-worskhop/judinglemming
|username=The Amazing Rancid
|handle=retchinglemming
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂Arnold37902 [[/span]] Ok boomer.
|echoes=0
|hums=40
|time-and-date=10:26 AM - 12 June 2023
]]
-----
[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/guezma-worskhop/tatoo%20pfp
|username=Alyx's parlor
|handle=Lihakut'atoo
|void-msg=Phew, this took my whole day but I finished this special work for a client.   It was a bit challenging because the symbols were from another community and I wasn't used to them, but I'm really proud of how it came out! Here's a close-up of the back area (spent 2 hours on this part alone)
|echoes=32
|hums=97
|time-and-date=7:22 PM - 05 July 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/the-trainee-gets-trolled/Ron%20pfp
|username=Ron Gambi
|handle=curiousRG
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂Lihakut'atoo [[/span]] Nice work as always Alyx, that one is particularly impressive!
|echoes=0
|hums=7
|time-and-date=7:25 PM - 05 July 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/guezma-worskhop/tatoo%20pfp
|username=Alyx's parlor
|handle=Lihakut'atoo
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂curiousRG [[/span]] Wait what the fuck? This should be a blank post to you, since when can you see [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/an-anthropological-approach-to-sarkicism-case-study-02-the-d ūrma] sigils?
|echoes=3
|hums=24
|time-and-date=7:29 PM - 05 July 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/the-trainee-gets-trolled/Ron%20pfp
|username=Ron Gambi
|handle=curiousRG
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂Lihakut'atoo [[/span]] Funny you would ask...
|echoes=0
|hums=12
|time-and-date=7:33 PM - 05 July 2023
]]

-----
[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/the-trainee-gets-trolled/Ron%20pfp
|username=Ron Gambi
|handle=curiousRG
|void-msg=Lately, in preparation for [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/gambi-s-gambit an upcoming operation] (can't say more about it yet), I have been made to take daily doses of diluted mnestics to recover some crucial memories.
Pros: Improved my short-term memory
Cons: I haven't remembered a single key memory so far. Lots of cringy ones from middle school though.
|echoes=36
|hums=97
|time-and-date=8:12 PM - 05 July 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/guezma-worskhop/HOGSLICE%20PFP
|username=HOGSLICE
|handle=HOGSLICE
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂curiousRG [[/span]]OWN THE OPPORTUNITY, BROTHER!
WHEN YOUR VIVID MEMORIES COME, FACE AGAINST YOUR PAST SELF AND MAKE HIM YOUR BITCH! SHOVE ALL THAT SELF-GROWTH YOU'VE DONE INTO HIS FACE!
I DO THIS EVERY DAY BECAUSE I AM CONSTANTLY GETTING BETTER!
--HOGSLICE
|echoes=24
|hums=134
|time-and-date=8:14 PM - 05 July 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/the-trainee-gets-trolled/Ron%20pfp
|username=Ron Gambi
|handle=curiousRG
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂HOGSLICE [[/span]] Wow thanks, I guess that's a good way to look at it. 
The next time I remember when I asked my crush out, got rejected and went to grief his house on the school minecraft server; I'll be able to confidently say I'm not that kind of person anymore.
|echoes=50
|hums=27
|time-and-date=8:15 PM - 05 July 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/guezma-worskhop/HOGSLICE%20PFP
|username=HOGSLICE
|handle=HOGSLICE
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂curiousRG [[/span]] I GOT SOME OTHER ADVICE FOR YOU PAL: DON'T SHARE LAME-ASS STORIES LIKE THAT ON THE INTERNET!
--HOGSLICE
|echoes=34
|hums=221
|time-and-date=8:16 PM - 05 July 2023
]]
-----
[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/guezma-worskhop/brendaboninable
|username=Brendabominable
|handle=Brendabominable
|void-msg= -Masters' registration is going well, got a nice reference letter
-At the part where I need to upload docs, I have everything... but
-They ask for detailed records of all my undergraduate exam scores.
-I don't have those
-"It's fine you can just ask your university, they keep records."
-I'm a Deer College Graduate
-All past archives were lost when 3Ports went to shit in the Impasse
-mfw
|echoes=138
|hums=524
|time-and-date=5:30 PM - 10 July 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/the-trainee-gets-trolled/Ron%20pfp
|username=Ron Gambi
|handle=curiousRG
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂Brendabominable [[/span]] Damn, that's bad luck. There might be a way to get those scores, though it's a long shot.
I've heard that the Foundation used to keep an eye on graduates from anomalous schools. You can go to a Vanguard Lighthouse and ask if there are any files on you in the archives. It's not guaranteed, but I'd say it's worth trying.
|echoes=37
|hums=174
|time-and-date=6:10 PM - 10 July 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/guezma-worskhop/brendaboninable
|username=Brendabominable
|handle=Brendabominable
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂curiousRG [[/span]] Holy shit, thank you so much?! 
I did that, and they just sent me an email with a bunch of pdfs about me, and they've got my scores! Masters' degree here I come!
There's actually a LOT in these pdfs, I'm skimming through them rn and it's honestly worrying  how much they've got. I didn't even do anything bad??
|echoes=48
|hums=239
|time-and-date=3:51 PM - 11 July 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/guezma-worskhop/brendaboninable
|username=Brendabominable
|handle=Brendabominable
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂Brendabominable [[/span]] [[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂curiousRG [[/span]] MY ROOMMATE WAS A FUCKING TERRORIST??!!
|echoes=26
|hums=135
|time-and-date=4:27 PM - 11 July 2023
]]
-----

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/the-trainee-gets-trolled/Ron%20pfp
|username=Ron Gambi
|handle=curiousRG
|void-msg= AIDE?? Je suis lire vieux livre pris sur Amazon et là je perdu Anglais? Je suis penser en Français?? Mais je parles très mal Français et alors je pas compris que je pense???
|echoes=72
|hums=148
|time-and-date=9:07 PM - 25 July 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post-source
|profile-pic=http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/guezma-worskhop/Lybrarian
|username=Enlightener Librarian
|handle=The_Lybrarian
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂curiousRG [[/span]] Hello, it appears that you have been placed under the effects of a level 2 Language Inversion curse. Please refer to the attached image, in which I have memetically encoded the instructions on how to remove it.
@@ @@
[[image http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/guezma-worskhop/encodedfractal ]] 
|echoes=0
|hums=1
|time-and-date=9:10 PM - 25 July 2023
]]


[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/the-trainee-gets-trolled/Ron%20pfp
|username=Ron Gambi
|handle=⁂curiousRG
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂The_Lybrarian [[/span]] Oh my god thank you so much, I thought I was going to be stuck like forever. How can I repay you?
|echoes=0
|hums=0
|time-and-date=9:23 PM - 25 July 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/guezma-worskhop/Lybrarian
|username=Enlightener Librarian
|handle=The_Lybrarian
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂curiousRG [[/span]] There is no need. As part of the cleansing ritual you performed, 35£ have been transferred out of your account. Have a great day and do keep this account in mind if you ever get cursed again.
|echoes=0
|hums=0
|time-and-date=9:24 PM - 25 July 2023
]]
-----
[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/guezma-worskhop/hummingkrosmozfan
|username=Mekhane's silliest scrunglo
|handle=hummingkrosmozfan
|void-msg=I've been re-binging some Voice of Vanguard episode. Do ya'll remember that moron who was on episode 17? What was his deal?
|echoes=49
|hums=104
|time-and-date=2:44 PM - 07 August 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/guezma-worskhop/religioussteeltype
|username=Steelix off the string
|handle=religioussteeltype
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂hummingkrosmozfan [[/span]] Right? I was almsot expecting him to bust out a slur at any moment, but then again he was so ignorant I don't think he knew any.
|echoes=10
|hums=38
|time-and-date=2:46 PM - 07 August 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/guezma-worskhop/hummingkrosmozfan
|username=Mekhane's silliest scrunglo
|handle=hummingkrosmozfan
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂religioussteeltype [[/span]] The dude just ragequit in the middle of the episode lol. Probably went back to whine on that loser forum.
|echoes=49
|hums=104
|time-and-date=2:47 PM - 07 August 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/the-trainee-gets-trolled/Ron%20pfp
|username=Ron Gambi
|handle=curiousRG
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂hummingkrosmozfan [[/span]] [[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂religioussteeltype [[/span]] Ouch, but fair.
Hi, I'm that guy and I thought I'd let you know that I've changed a lot since that time. I no longer hang out with //that// crowd and I even got a job at Vanguard to help reach out to people. 
|echoes=13
|hums=57
|time-and-date=3:06 PM - 07 August 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/guezma-worskhop/religioussteeltype
|username=Steelix off the string
|handle=religioussteeltype
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂curiousRG[[/span]] Really? Good for you man! You still deserved that roast though.
|echoes=0
|hums=22
|time-and-date=3:17 PM - 07 August 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/the-trainee-gets-trolled/Ron%20pfp
|username=Ron Gambi
|handle=curiousRG
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂religioussteeltype [[/span]] yeah, I did :)
|echoes=0
|hums=13
|time-and-date=3:20 PM - 07 August 2023
]]
-----

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/the-trainee-gets-trolled/Ron%20pfp
|username=Ron Gambi
|handle=curiousRG
|void-msg=I know I got this app for my job, but I'm so glad I did. Everyone here is so nice. I was missing this social media experience since I quit Parawatch. Thanks for being cool, folks!
|echoes=37
|hums=184
|time-and-date=11:20 AM - 10 August 2023
]]

-----
[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/guezma-worskhop/filmdebater%20pfp
|username=Maxime17530
|handle=Maxime17530
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂curiousRG [[/span]]... and therefore I believe I have shown you all the evidence to prove that it's all just cgi. [7/7]
|echoes=0
|hums=0
|time-and-date=9:46 AM - 22 August 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/the-trainee-gets-trolled/Ron%20pfp
|username=Ron Gambi
|handle=curiousRG
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂Maxime17530 [[/span]] Dude those are all just internal studies and statistics, OF COURSE they won't tell you everything. Meanwhile I've linked you to several documents and testimonies that prove what I've been saying: Disney had been hiring thaumaturges to produce special effects for their films and violating their workers' rights well before the Veil got lifted.
|echoes=0
|hums=0
|time-and-date=9:50 AM - 22 August 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/guezma-worskhop/filmdebater%20pfp
|username=Maxime17530
|handle=Maxime17530
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂curiousRG [[/span]] Come on, why would they do that?
|echoes=0
|hums=0
|time-and-date=9:52 AM - 22 August 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/the-trainee-gets-trolled/Ron%20pfp
|username=Ron Gambi
|handle=curiousRG
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂Maxime17530 [[/span]] Because of the heavily enforced secrecy, Disney had a strong monopoly on the thaumaturgical special effects field so they could just hire en masse and severely underpay these artists, just like their regular vfx artists.
|echoes=0
|hums=0
|time-and-date=9:55 AM - 22 August 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/guezma-worskhop/filmdebater%20pfp
|username=Maxime17530
|handle=Maxime17530
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂curiousRG [[/span]] You do realise how far fetched this sounds right? And besides, all of their vfx artists are well paid and very loyal, so why would Disney go through the trouble just to use magic effects?
|echoes=0
|hums=0
|time-and-date=9:58 AM - 22 August 2023
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:void-post
|profile-pic=http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/guezma-worskhop/VKTMpfp.jpg
|username=VKTM
|handle=Vikander-Kneed Technical Media
|void-msg=[[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂curiousRG [[/span]] [[span class="vactivity"]] ⁂Maxime17530 [[/span]] Indeed, why would they use thaumaturgical special effects? And for that matter, why use computer effects either?
